positions.subtitle: Moonfrog Labs
positions.description: Carrom Gold- Lauched features to improve first time user experience, and early retention- Launched multiple new game modes and mechanics to improve user engagement, revenue- Conducted app store optimizations and ad optimizations to improve installs- Designed game levels for progression based game modes- Led improvement in game physics and AI game bots- Organised team wide customer research calls for more user-centric approach in game development. - Led resolution of multiple technical issues like high latency, checksum failures.- Released the game on multiple platforms like Instagram, Snapchat
positions.title: Product Manager
positions.description_html:
Carrom Gold
- Lauched features to improve first time user experience, and early retention
- Launched multiple new game modes and mechanics to improve user engagement, revenue
- Conducted app store optimizations and ad optimizations to improve installs
- Designed game levels for progression based game modes
- Led improvement in game physics and AI game bots
- Organised team wide customer research calls for more user-centric approach in game development.
- Led resolution of multiple technical issues like high latency, checksum failures.
- Released the game on multiple platforms like Instagram, Snapchat
